
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	vector<int> vi;
	vi.reserve(2500000);
	int t,l;
	long long int n,n2;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	l =1;
	while(l<=t){
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		n2 =n;
		while(n2){
			vi.push_back(n2%10);
			n2 /=10;
		}
		n -=1;
		while(n>=1){
			int temp = 0;
			for(int i = 0;i<vi.size();i++){
				vi[i] = vi[i]*n + temp;
				temp = vi[i]/10;
				vi[i] %=10;
				if(i==vi.size()-1 && temp!=0)
					vi.push_back(0);
			}
			--n;
		}
		for(int i=vi.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
			cout<<vi[i];
		if(l!=t)
			cout<<"\n";
		vi.clear();
		++l;
	}

	return 0;
}
